Class MainFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • ru.nsu.cg.MainFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MainWindow

    public class MainFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    MainFrame - main application frame Application should subclass it to create its own implementation
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • createMenuItem

        public javax.swing.JMenuItem createMenuItem(java.lang.String title,
                                            java.lang.String tooltip,
                                            int mnemonic,
                                            java.lang.String icon,
                                            java.lang.String actionMethod)
                                     throws java.lang.SecurityException,
                                            java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
        Shortcut method to create menu item Note that you have to insert it into proper place by yourself
        Parameters:
        title - - menu item title
        tooltip - - floating tooltip describing menu item
        mnemonic - - mnemonic key to activate item via keyboard
        icon - - file name containing icon (must be located in 'resources' subpackage relative to your implementation of MainFrame), can be null
        actionMethod - - String containing method name which will be called when menu item is activated (method should not take any parameters)
        Returns:
        created menu item
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - - when actionMethod method not found
        java.lang.SecurityException - - when actionMethod method is inaccessible

      • createMenuItem

        public javax.swing.JMenuItem createMenuItem(java.lang.String title,
                                            java.lang.String tooltip,
                                            int mnemonic,
                                            java.lang.String actionMethod)
                                     throws java.lang.SecurityException,
                                            java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
        Shortcut method to create menu item (without icon) Note that you have to insert it into proper place by yourself
        Parameters:
        title - - menu item title
        tooltip - - floating tooltip describing menu item
        mnemonic - - mnemonic key to activate item via keyboard
        actionMethod - - String containing method name which will be called when menu item is activated (method should not take any parameters)
        Returns:
        created menu item
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - - when actionMethod method not found
        java.lang.SecurityException - - when actionMethod method is inaccessible

      • createSubMenu

        public javax.swing.JMenu createSubMenu(java.lang.String title,
                                       int mnemonic)
        Creates submenu and returns it
        Parameters:
        title - - submenu title
        mnemonic - - mnemonic key to activate submenu via keyboard
        Returns:
        created submenu

      • addSubMenu

        public void addSubMenu(java.lang.String title,
                       int mnemonic)
        Creates submenu and inserts it to the specified location
        Parameters:
        title - - submenu title with full path (just submenu title for top-level submenus) example: "File/New" - will create submenu "New" under menu "File" (provided that menu "File" was previously created)
        mnemonic - - mnemonic key to activate submenu via keyboard

      • addMenuItem

        public void addMenuItem(java.lang.String title,
                        java.lang.String tooltip,
                        int mnemonic,
                        java.lang.String icon,
                        java.lang.String actionMethod)
                 throws java.lang.SecurityException,
                        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
        Creates menu item and adds it to the specified menu location
        Parameters:
        title - - menu item title with full path
        tooltip - - floating tooltip describing menu item
        mnemonic - - mnemonic key to activate item via keyboard
        icon - - file name containing icon (must be located in 'resources' subpackage relative to your implementation of MainFrame), can be null
        actionMethod - - String containing method name which will be called when menu item is activated (method should not take any parameters)
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - - when actionMethod method not found
        java.lang.SecurityException - - when actionMethod method is inaccessible
        java.security.InvalidParameterException - - when specified menu location not found

        private javax.swing.MenuElement getParentMenuElement(java.lang.String menuPath)
        Looks for menu element by menu path ignoring last path component
        Parameters:
        menuPath - - '/'-separated path to menu item (example: "Help/About...")
        Returns:
        found menu item or null if no such item found
